<title level="1" right="Trait">[Razing](/Traits.aspx?ID=784)</title>

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 274 <sup>1.1</sup>

Razing weapons are particularly good at damaging objects, structures, and vehicles. Whenever you deal damage to an object (including [shields](Shields.aspx) and [animated objects](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=360)), structure, or vehicle with a razing weapon, the object takes an amount of additional damage equal to double the number of weapon damage dice.
